flawed_nl_solution:
Tom will be 30 in 5 years so now he is 30-5 = <<30-5=24>>24
2 years ago Tom was 24-2 = <<24-2=22>>22
At that time, Jared was twice as old as Tom so Jared was 22*2 = 44
Two years have since passed so Jared is now 44+2 = <<44+2=46>>46
#### 46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 24. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
